creditline: Gift of Jill Bonovitz and Nancy Hellebrand in honor of their mother, Janet Fleisher
description: primitive style; view of a Neoclassical white building at right with green shutters; large tree at left; yellow bricks, LLC; three women wearing pink, blue and grey and man in LLQ; couple with woman wearing white dress and two men with a woman wearing blue dress in front of building
signed: LRC, in black: J MCCARTHY | URC, in black: MONTEIGNE
title: Monteigne
